channel.title: Run isnt working
channel.description:
My run isnt working for any source.. for some reason its doing this and i can log in.. here is a picture of it.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2zt9gso.png[/img]
for ever server i downloaded its doing this... i don't know why but its not working. Can you help me..
Thank You for you help.

item.title: Run isnt working
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

I see ur on either vista or windows 7 either way most clients/servers won’t run unless you either edit the batch file or find one for it.

If you have another client that works you can just copy the run.bat from there, just be sure to place it in the risght spot or edit it and tell it what folder to activate by adding

cb example/client/bin

right after the title on a new line

Read full topic
